title: @riot Can I gift chromas?
body: Just as the title says. I have 300 RP and I want to give a single chroma to a friend (that sweet BR pink poppy) but I can't find the option on the gifting center

replies.body: I don't believe chromas are currently giftabe.  Your best bet would be to gift RP instead and have the recipient obtain it themselves.  I hope that helps!
Hey just want to say it's been 10 months and still no update on this. Are you guys planning to add a option to gift choma's yet?

Thanks for the reply. The point was to use the 300 RP I already have, I suppose the only thing left is wait until the next month to buy more RP :)
